singer and actress Jennifer Lopez . Some reports have been lukewarm on whether this will help revive the show's ratings and Jennifer Lopez 's career, both of which have been in decline of late. The LA Times says, With Ellen DeGeneres leaving and Jennifer Lopez reportedly singing on as her replacement, "American Idol has indisputably jumped the shark."
